There were no other sightings in Visalia on or around July 23rd 2012
Summary: green turned to blue orb or ball comming down in a Z direction
divs: Sighting Details3:30 AM Heading West on Caldwell ave, There was a green light going across the sky heading North just South of Visalia Ca when it got almost directly in front of me it turned to a bright blue, it made an abrupt stop and headed back south, again it made an abrupt turn back north like a Z pattern sharp 90o turns.
